laws.full_text:
se provide 14 calendar days to review
Exceptions: Banned for construction employees, physicians, broadcast employees, nurses and nurse aides, and employees covered by collective bargaining agreements
Indiana

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: n/a
Notice requirement: n/a
Exceptions: Limited f
laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to include a 14-calendar-day review period: 'You have 14 calendar days from the date of this offer to review this agreement, including the non-compete provisions, before signing.' Additionally, ensure the non-compete clause is reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities, as required under Indiana law.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
